com.codename1.rad.attributes

Class Badge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codename1.rad.models.Attribute<String>
      • com.codename1.rad.attributes.Badge

  • public class Badge
extends Attribute<String>

    An attribute that can be used on an ActionNode to add a badge to the action.

    See Also:
    BadgeUIID, ActionNode, UI#badge(String), UI#badge(StringProvider)
